title: Episode 289: No Hostages Here (Feat. Sabrina Parr)
itunes:title: Episode 289: No Hostages Here (Feat. Sabrina Parr)
description:
This week Sabrina Parr is here to promote her upcoming episode of “Behind Every Man” on OWN (2/6/21). The television show features Sabrina’s journey with Lamar Odom during their relationship. Unfortunately, Sabrina and Lamar are no longer together…The ladies discuss a range of topics including the allegations of Sabrina holding Lamar’s social media accounts hostage, whether Lamar is still using drugs, and much more! Sabrina even gets spicy when calling out Matt Barnes after he claimed she was seeking attention. Enjoy!

Make sure to check out Ancestry.com/Angela to get your DNA kit and start your free trial today!
